data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Geoff Eltringham signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 2, Free kick in a good position for Cardiff!
Cardiff drive upfield and Junior Hoilett gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fulham defender.
Goal kick for Fulham at Cardiff City Stadium.
In the minute 3, Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Geoff Eltringham awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 6, Attention is being given to Fulhamâ€™s Harrison Reed and play has been suspended briefly.
Cardiff are whistled for offside.
Harrison Reed returns to the field for Fulham after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Fulham in the half of Cardiff.
Tim Ream (Fulham) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Cardiff a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 10, Fulham have been awarded a corner by Geoff Eltringham.
Fulham's Joe Bryan gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cardiff defender.
At Cardiff City Stadium, Fulham are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 11, Geoff Eltringham signals a Cardiff throw-in in Fulham's half.
In Cardiff Cardiff drive forward through Leandro Bacuna. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Cardiff at Cardiff City Stadium.
In the minute 15, Fulham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Robert Glatzel for Cardiff drives towards goal at Cardiff City Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Fulham to take a throw-in in Cardiff territory.
In the minute 19, Fulham have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Cardiff in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 22, Throw-in high up the field for Cardiff in Cardiff.
Geoff Eltringham signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Cardiff to check on Joe Bryan, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 24, Joe Bryan for Fulham is back on the field again.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cardiff's half?
Cardiff's Junior Hoilett has run offside.
In the minute 28, Cardiff awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Cardiff is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Fulham.
In the minute 31, Cardiff drives forward and Robert Glatzel gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in Fulham.
In Cardiff Fulham's Anthony Knockaert is caught offside.
In the minute 33, Fulham push forward at Cardiff City Stadium and Neeskens Kebano gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cardiff defence.
Free kick for Cardiff in the half of Fulham.
Cardiff to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
In the minute 37, Can Cardiff get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
Fulham pushes forward through Joshua Onomah, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Cardiff in their own half.
Throw-in for Cardiff in the half of Fulham.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Geoff Eltringham signals a Fulham throw-in in Cardiff's half.
Free kick for Cardiff in their own half.
Geoff Eltringham signals a free kick to Cardiff in their own half.
In the minute 44, Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Fulham capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 45, Geoff Eltringham will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Anthony Knockaert for Fulham gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cardiff goal kick.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fulham's Tom Cairney misses with an attempt on goal.
Cardiff have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Geoff Eltringham signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
Geoff Eltringham awards Cardiff a goal kick.
The first-half has ended.
Junior Hoilett is booked for the home team.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Cardiff.
Free kick for Cardiff in their own half.
Cardiff awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, Geoff Eltringham signals a free kick to Fulham.
Joshua Onomah puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Cardiff needs to be cautious. Fulham have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Fulham in the half of Cardiff.
Throw-in Fulham.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fulham's Anthony Knockaert is on target but unsuccessful.
Fulham are coming forward and Bobby Reid gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the home team in Cardiff.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cardiff.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
In the minute 66, Fulham have been awarded a corner by Geoff Eltringham.
Fulham's Neeskens Kebano gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Cardiff at Cardiff City Stadium.
In the minute 70, Danny Ward is replacing Robert Glatzel for Cardiff at Cardiff City Stadium.
Neil Harris (Cardiff) is making a second substitution, with Josh Murphy replacing Nathaniel Mendez Laing.
Will Vaulks is on a sub for Junior Hoilett for Cardiff.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Cardiff at Cardiff City Stadium.
Geoff Eltringham signals a Cardiff throw-in in Fulham's half.
Can Cardiff capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fulham's half?
In the minute 74, Geoff Eltringham awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Fulham close to the penalty box.
Fulham are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Cardiff in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Fulham close to the penalty box.
In the minute 78, Fulham's Harrison Reed breaks free at Cardiff City Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Geoff Eltringham awards Cardiff a goal kick.
Leandro Bacuna (Cardiff) has received a yellow card from Geoff Eltringham.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 79, Geoff Eltringham signals a throw-in for Cardiff, close to Fulham's area.
Important block from the Fulham defence as Leandro Bacuna fires in a strike for Cardiff.
Fulham to take a throw-in in Cardiff territory.
In the minute 81, The away team replace Anthony Knockaert with Aboubakar Kamara.
Tom Cairney (Fulham) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Cardiff in their own half.
In the minute 83, Ball safe as Cardiff is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cardiff drive forward but Joe Ralls is judged offside.
Joshua Onomah for Fulham is whistled offside.
In the minute 85, Danny Ward for the home team is judged to be offside.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cardiff's half?
Joshua Onomah of Fulham is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 87, Geoff Eltringham signals a free kick to Cardiff.
Throw-in high up the field for Cardiff in Cardiff.
Geoff Eltringham signals a throw-in for Fulham, close to Cardiff's area.
Geoff Eltringham signals a free kick to Fulham just outside Cardiff's area.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Fulham in the half of Cardiff.
It's 0-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Neeskens Kebano extends Fulham's lead to 0-2.
Scott Parker is making the team's second substitution at Cardiff City Stadium with Denis Odoi replacing Neeskens Kebano.
